parameters.skips: a numeric vector giving the number of visible solder skips.
parameters.Panel: 1:3 indicating the panel on a board being tested.

description:
Description
The solder.balance data frame has 720 rows and 6 columns, representing
a balanced subset of a designed experiment varying 5 factors on the
soldering of components on printed-circuit boards.
The solder data frame is the full version of the data with 900
rows.  It is located in both the rpart and the survival packages.
title: Soldering of Components on Printed-Circuit Boards
reference:
John M. Chambers and Trevor J. Hastie eds. (1992)
Statistical Models in S, Wadsworth and Brooks/Cole,
Pacific Grove, CA.
format: This data frame contains the following columns:
